unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Fever Grips the Nation!**
normalised: Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Fever Grips the Nation!

unnormalised: Lights, camera, action! Film festivals are popping up all over India, and we're here for it! From the serene backwaters of Kerala to the bustling streets of Mumbai, cinephiles are in for a treat.
normalised: Lights, camera, action! Film festivals are popping up all over India, and we're here for it! From the serene backwaters of Kerala to the bustling streets of Mumbai, cinephiles are in for a treat.

unnormalised: The buzz is real about the upcoming "Golden Elephant" International Children's Film Festival in Hyderabad, with a record number of submissions this year – around 1,200 from 70 countries! Expect animation galore and heartwarming stories.
normalised: The buzz is real about the upcoming "Golden Elephant" International Children's Film Festival in Hyderabad, with a record number of submissions this year – around one thousand two hundred from seventy countries! Expect animation galore and heartwarming stories.

unnormalised: But that's not all folks! The Kolkata Film Festival is gearing up for its annual extravaganza in November, promising a smorgasbord of world cinema. Remember to grab a steaming plate of biryani while you're there – a Kolkata essential!
normalised: But that's not all folks! The Kolkata Film Festival is gearing up for its annual extravaganza in November, promising a smorgasbord of world cinema. Remember to grab a steaming plate of biryani while you're there – a Kolkata essential!

unnormalised: And down south, expect Onam celebrations to blend beautifully with film screenings in Kerala during their various regional fests. Talk about a cultural explosion!
normalised: And down south, expect Onam celebrations to blend beautifully with film screenings in Kerala during their various regional fests. Talk about a cultural explosion!

unnormalised: So, grab your popcorn (or some masala chai!) and get ready to immerse yourselves in the magic of cinema. Who knows, you might just discover the next Satyajit Ray! Keep watching this space for more updates!
normalised: So, grab your popcorn (or some masala chai!) and get ready to immerse yourselves in the magic of cinema. Who knows, you might just discover the next Satyajit Ray! Keep watching this space for more updates!
